scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ riding on a donkey, approaching a group of people who are laying down garments on the ground. Christ, dressed in a white robe, is shown from the side, looking towards the viewer. The donkey is walking over a brown cloth. To the right, a figure kneels and appears to be arranging the cloth, while a crowd of individuals, also in white robes, stands behind them, observing the procession. In the background, a rocky hill and stylized trees are visible, with a hint of a building with columns and arches on the far right.
